short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your tabs by organizing them into projects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Group is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you manage your browser tabs efficiently by organizing them into projects. Whether juggling multiple tasks at work, managing research for a project, or just wanting to keep your browsing organized, Tab Group makes it easy to keep track of your tabs and windows.

Features:
1. Organize Tabs into Projects: Group related tabs together into projects. Easily create, edit, and delete projects to keep your workspaces organized.
2. Drag and Drop Interface: Effortlessly move tabs from your open windows to a project using a simple drag and drop interface.
3. Project Overview: Get a clear view of all your projects and the tabs associated with each project. The interface is divided into three panes: Project Names, Projects, and Open Windows.
4. Open All Tabs: Quickly open all tabs within a project in a new Chrome window, streamlining your workflow.
5. Tab Management: Add, edit, and delete individual tabs within your projects. Avoid duplication with built-in checks.
6. Undo Last Change: Made a mistake? Easily undo the last change with a single click.
7. Customizable Projects: Rename projects and customize them as your needs evolve.

Benefits:
1. Enhanced Productivity: Keep your tabs organized by context, reducing clutter and helping you stay focused on the task at hand.
2. Time-Saving: Quickly switch between projects without losing track of important tabs.
3. User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design makes managing tabs simple and efficient.
4. Customizable Workspace: Tailor your tab organization to fit your workflow and preferences.

Take control of your browsing experience with Tab Group, and never lose track of your tabs again!
